WorkItem.Description:
I tried:
 
<AutoCompleteBox x:Name="acbItems" Initialized="acbItems_Initialized">
  <AutoCompleteBox.SelectedItem>
    <MultiBinding Converter="{StaticResource MyConverter}" Mode="TwoWay" ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" UpdateSourceTrigger="Explicit">
      <Binding Mode="OneWay"/>
      <Binding Path="Item" ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" Mode="TwoWay" />
    </MultiBinding>
  </AutoCompleteBox.SelectedItem>
</AutoCompleteBox>
 
But:
 
Private Sub acbItems_Initialized(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs)
    Dim be = acbItems.GetBindingExpression(AutoCompleteBox.SelectedItemProperty)
End Sub
 
'be' evaluates to nothing!
